Question.Subject: XAT help pl0x!!!!!!!!?
Question.Content:
When i was on xat chats a link popped up that said i should download it, and the chat would preform better.I downloaded it, and now i can't even see the chats...The thing it said i should download was Flash or something like that...Ya is there anything i can do so i can actually see that chats(As in use them)
Thanks LoLz PHBK...
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Might I recommend Chatango?
Lol anyways I recommend downloading Flash Player,
Here's a link:
http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/?promoid=DXLUJ
